functional_requirements.description: Advertisers shall be able to register with the application.
Registration shall require verification through OTP.
Advertisers shall be able to log in to the application using their credentials.
Advertisers shall be able to reset their password through a forgotten password feature.
Advertisers shall be able to view their profile information.
Advertisers shall be able to update their profile information.
Advertisers shall be able to view their wallet balance.
Advertisers shall be able to view their transaction history.
Advertisers shall be able to recharge their wallet using JAZZ CASH.
Advertisers shall be able to recharge their wallet using vouchers.
Advertisers shall be able to create advertising campaigns.
Advertisers shall be able to specify campaign parameters including target location, campaign duration, number of cars, and advertisement content (images).
Advertisers shall be able to view active campaigns.
Advertisers shall be able to view pending campaigns.
Advertisers shall be able to view completed campaigns.
Advertisers shall be able to track the current location of drivers displaying their advertisements.
Advertisers shall be able to contact customer support.
Advertisers shall be able to inquire about driver status.
Drivers shall be able to register with the application.
Drivers shall be able to log in to the application using their credentials.
Drivers shall be able to sign out from the application.
Drivers shall be able to view their profile information.
Drivers shall be able to update their profile information.
Drivers shall be able to upload images of their vehicles.

non_functional_requirements.description: The mobile applications shall load within 3 seconds on devices meeting the minimum specifications.
The system shall support a minimum of 1000 concurrent users.
Location tracking updates shall occur at least every 30 seconds.
API responses shall be delivered within 2 seconds under normal load.
The system shall handle up to 100 campaign creations per minute.
Push notifications shall be delivered within 5 seconds of triggering events.
The driver application shall not require interaction while the vehicle is in motion.
The system shall comply with local road safety regulations regarding vehicle modifications.
The system shall verify that advertisements do not obstruct driver visibility.
The system shall monitor and flag potentially unsafe driving behaviors.
User authentication shall employ secure password hashing.
All API communications shall be encrypted using TLS.
Payment information shall be handled in compliance with PCI DSS standards.
User sessions shall timeout after 30 minutes of inactivity.
The system shall implement rate limiting to prevent brute force attacks.
The system shall maintain audit logs of all administrative actions.
The interface shall be intuitive enough that a new user can complete basic tasks without assistance.
The system shall maintain 99.5% uptime during operating hours.
The system shall be available 24/7 with scheduled maintenance windows.
